name: WILD ALASKA SLOT MACHINE
description:
Amazing ALASKAN themed 20 LINE slot machine!

Experience the WILD ADVENTURE of ALASKA with WILD ALASKA Slots!

Open the cabin door on one of three bonus rounds and see if a BEAR awaits! There are 3 amazing bonus rounds to play.

WILD ALASKA offers multiple ways to wager, whilst at the same time providing various interactive features. During normal slot play the BALD EAGLE acts as a wildcard and substitutes for all symbols except BONUS symbols. All slot icons have beautiful 3D animations; the EAGLE tweets, the POLAR BEAR protects its young, fly over an animated 3D glacier, climb to the summit of a mountain. Enjoyable animations for lasting enjoyment. We have created a visually appealing slot, with various animations that don't over-complicate or interfere with game play.


Features:
-5 Reel Video Slot Machine
-20 WIN LINES!
-3 Bonus Rounds (BEAR in a cabin + Video Poker + Scratch Off Card)
-WILD,BONUS, Free spin Icons
-On Demand Card Gambling
-3D Animations throughout game
-3D Rendered Coin Shower on Big Win Jackpot
-x2 Payout animation gives twice the payout for a line
-Multiple spin,Bonus,Win sounds
-Game remembers credits; so you can play where you left off
-Smooth Play
-Great Graphics
-ALASKAN THEME

Getting started:

The paytable is located on the upper right hand side and should be referred to before playing, all buttons and game options are located at the top or bottom of the slot. All 20 Paylines are ALWAYS active, therefore all line bets are multiplied by 20 for each spin. Each BET is user selectable and ranges from $1 to $500 per line, which results in a bet of $20 to $10,000, this is a serious high stakes slot machine! Get at least 3 BONUS ICONS on a payline to enter one of the 3 BONUS Rounds. WILDS do not substitute for the BONUS icons. All our games use real math and near industry standard random number generation for maximum Las Vegas excitement. Priced at less than one "max bet spin" at your local casino slot machine, you will truly enjoy the exciting experience offered by this game.


NOTICE: These games are for entertainment purposes only. No real money can be won or lost. The odds of winning in this simulation are similar to VEGAS slot machines.

Hit "credit" on the bottom left of the slot to reset to $1000.

Good Luck and Have Fun!
